thread.section_title: PACK & SEND Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PACK & SEND Australia | www.packsend.com.au
thread.title: Robert Dorr
thread.title_full: PACK & SEND Australia reviewed by Robert Dorr

author: Robert Dorr
title: Robert Dorr
text:
I use this Pack & Send outlet a few times a year for forwarding of international parcels (up to 30kg), using their "self service".
On this occasion, I had a very light parcel to send to Finland and they worked out cheaper than Australia Post and definetley quicker, on their basic "budget" service. I dropped the item off to Chris and received the same excellent service and advice in a polite manner.
The parcel arrived in Finland by the P&S scheduled date and the tracking information was excellent.
The P&S service is often cheaper than Australia Post, and handles weights and dimensions that Australia Post cannot. The speed of international delivery (DHL I believe) is very impressive and the staff at Frankston 3199 most helpful.
Whilst I always use the "self service" I have always called the outlet if I had the slightest concern relating to my shipment and received helpful and courteous advice.
